TestCase.TestCaseObjective: Assess systems behaviour after Consumer restart within the Request/Response exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: A Consumer sends a Request and restarts before receiving the Response as prescribed utilising the Request/Response exchange pattern.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: Nominal restart. Assess (record) how systems behave if the Consumer restarts in the middle of the initialisation process.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Provider (1) is processing initialisation request from Consumer (2) as prescribed utilising the Request/Response exchange pattern.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumer (2) has not yet received the requested initialisation data.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: Consumer restarts before receiving the Provider's response.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Assess (record) how both systems, Provider and Consumer behave after Consumer's restart.
